Dear all-
apologies for cross posting,

I have learned that Sasama Yoshihik=
o Sensei of the Nihon Katchu Bugu
Rekishi Kenkyu-kai has passed away. I am =
sorry I cannot report the details
of his passing but know that his funeral =
was held on the 7th of November in
Japan.

He was truly a gentlemen and tru=
ly of the old school. A tireless
researcher, talented artist, prolific writ=
er and a teacher of inexhaustible
knowledge, patience and generosity. Thank=
s to him the very world we love to
inhabit, the true world of the samurai w=
arrior, his swords and armour have
been kept alive for us and generations t=
o come. He is gone and he will be
missed, but his writings remain as testam=
ent to the great, grand and good
man that he was.

I shall post more, shoul=
d I get the details, anyone wishing to send
condolence (via snail mail) fee=
l free to contact me OFF LIST.

Tom Helm
